name: Memo Cube
description:
Memo Cube is a miniature puzzle game inspired by the classic memory with our own twist. The objective is to rotate the cube and find pairs of matching colors!

Psssst. There may be a Secret button combination for the cube to solve itself.

Game design and programming by Filip Ivanovski 
Visuals by Marta Ivanovska

The background is a shader based on Aurora Borealis by Albert Elwin from Shader Toy.
The music loop used in game is Space Ambiance by Sonic Freak. 
Clicking noises made by mrrap4food and Feslyian Studios. The confirmation jingle by original_sound.
